notes.text: We now ensure that the group header of a responsive table remains sticky during vertical scrolling of the page
We now ensure that the insight cards reflect the same semantic coloring as the source table when defining row-level criticality
We've enhanced the message popover in tables to show row-related information by including the title and key field details
Key users can use the UI adaptation feature to modify the settings in the manifest.json file
We now ensure that returning to an application does not set the default table variant as modified
We now pass the URL parameter 'sap-appvar-id' to ensure proper navigation when launching the adaptation project application in My Home using the insights card
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue where the list report table failed to refresh after executing a determining action
We now ensure that the smart link popup displays the title based on the textArrangement annotation
You can now configure the rememberSelections property of a responsive table using the UI adaptation feature
We've improved the manifest merging logic of the adaptation project with the base project to handle the legacy manifest files
